headline: Is ConocoPhillips' Operation Resistant to Oil Price Volatility?
summary: COP's ultra-low-cost oil production helps it stay profitable despite price swings, setting it apart from peers.

headline: ConocoPhillips appoints Kathleen McGinty to its board of directors
summary: HOUSTON, July 01, 2025--ConocoPhillips today announced that its board of directors has elected Ms. Kathleen (Katie) McGinty to serve as a board member.

headline: Want at Least $1,000 in Passive Income per Year? Invest $10,000 in Each of These 3 Dividend Stocks.
summary: ConocoPhillips sees strong free cash flow growth thanks to investments in Alaska and liquefied natural gas.  LNG exporter Cheniere Energy Partners helps stabilize global energy markets.  Starbucks has the qualities necessary to execute a complex turnaround.
